Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Well, it looks like we have a pretty good population going here now. All thanks to you so far.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: You know I wouldn't be swinging around unless I didn't have something important to tell you.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: So here goes - the clothing store is open today!

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Great idea you had the other day on having the visiting Able Sisters set up shop here.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Their store turned out nicer than I expected.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Not that I had low expectations of course...

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Well don't just stand there! Go check it out! The shop is along the beach.
